Further adventures in cubing!

Here we see our hero solving the Supernova WuQue 4x4 M in a pretty poor time of 5:00. I've sped the solve up by 500% so you don't have to sit watching me fumble about for five minutes. One day I'll learn a method that's quicker than the beginner method, but I haven't yet.
